original_title: St David's Day at the BBC
overview: To celebrate St David’s Day, this trip through the BBC’s music archives features a selection of tracks from some of the most important and innovative Welsh artists of the past few decades.  The programme includes performances by Manic Street Preachers, Catatonia, Super Furry Animals, Marina and the Diamonds,  Stereophonics, Feeder, Shakin’ Stevens, Bonnie Tyler, Dame Shirley Bassey and Sir Tom Jones.
title: St David's Day at the BBC
